00001 #define FLASH_BASE      ((unsigned int *)0x01000000)
00002 #define FLASH_SIZE      (2*1024*1024)
00003 
00004 /* 
00005  * EBI initialization.
00006  *
00007  * 0x01000000, 16MB, 2 tdf, 16 bits, 7 WS  
00008  */
00009 #define EBI_CSR_0       ((unsigned int *)(FLASH_BASE | 0x2539)     
00010 #define EBI_CSR_1       ((unsigned int *)0x10000000)
00011 #define EBI_CSR_2       ((unsigned int *)0x20000000)
00012 #define EBI_CSR_3       ((unsigned int *)0x30000000)

00016 #define EBI_CSR_7       ((unsigned int *)0x70000000)
